caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. The video starts with something resembling a map, showing an under-construction castle and trees that are gradually growing larger. The map continues to expand and eventually transitions to a castle area. A young boy discovers something on the map and follows it to a secluded place. He wakes up from a dream, and there is someone kind-looking watching over him as he lies in bed.In another location, the young boy is being held by a giant, while another smaller individual is talking to them. The arrival of the smaller person initially upsets the others, but they eventually accept him. They engage in a conversation, and the child shows the young boy a piece of paper, which greatly excites him.
